name: SCROOGE JUNIOR
description: SCROOGE JR is a hyper-deflationary rewards crypto token launching exclusively on the Binance Smart Chain. Simply by holding $SCROOGEJR tokens, users will receive a 6% portion of each SCROOGE JR transaction that is automatically converted to BUSD Rewards. Each holderâ€™s BUSD rewards are determined by the percent of the overall SCROOGE JR supply they own.. 6% of every SCROOGE JR buy/sell transaction is redistributed to all holders in the form of Binance-Pegged BUSD. 2% of every transaction is transferred into the PancakeSwap liquidity pool to create a stable price floor. 4% of every transaction is transferred into the smart contract for ecosystem development. 4% of every transaction is transferred into the smart contract for Arcade Rewards Each holder will also have free access to the SCROOGE Arcade, where they can authenticate wallet to monitor holdings/reflections, collect rewards, play games based on tier, compete in weekly challenges, and climb the leaderboard. We are also building SCROOGE JR franchise gaming.
